master.name: University of Toulon
master.degree: Master's Degree in Digital Project Management and Innovation
master.description: This master's program focuses on acquiring fundamentals of project management, collaborative management processes, technology watch, and essential knowledge for developing creative communication strategies in digital environments.

license.name: University of Toulon
license.degree: Professional License in E-commerce and Digital Marketing (ECMN)
license.description: This professional license trains in marketing techniques using new technologies and adapting internal company technologies.

dut.name: University of Toulon
dut.description: The MMI DUT encompasses web design and development, graphic design, and digital project management and animation for business and organization communication.

bts.name: UIMM Provence
bts.description: The Aeronautics BTS is a diploma that trains in production, operations and maintenance activities in the aeronautical field.

scalian.title: PMO + Data manager
scalian.description: I started as a PMO in March 2024 for Airbus through the consulting firm Scalian. My first assignment, from March to December 2024, involved coordinating a department within a supply chain transformation project with a significant communication component. From January 2025, without any bench time between contracts, I took on two part-time roles that occupy 100% of my schedule. The first is a pure PMO role, coordinating stakeholders in the deconstruction/reconstruction of a paint facility. The second is more digitally focused, involving the automation of performance spreadsheets (Google Sheets) and guiding teams through their transition to a new methodology. My journey at Airbus extends beyond these three main assignments. Numerous additional digital-oriented tasks and a last-minute project rescue have further enriched my full-time experience.

stratis.title: Web Project Manager
stratis.description: As a digital project manager at Stratis, I was responsible, in partnership with a digital project director, for managing web projects for local authorities throughout all phases of a website creation project: Conducting pre-launch and launch meetings, creating wireframes for clients, coordinating the graphic team, initiating developments and monitoring testing with WordPress client training.

univ_toulon.title: Web Project Manager
univ_toulon.description: During my internship at the University of Toulon, I was project manager for an educational application project promoting hybrid training called "E-DEAL". I was the intermediary, supporting my tutor between a development company based in Grand-Est "Allucyne" and the University of Toulon to bring my technical and student expertise to this application.

groom.title: Marketing Assistant
groom.description: Website integration on ReactJS CMS, Creation of a Laravel 8 dashboard, Web directory redesign, various logo and video creation and modification tasks, Creation of mockups using Adobe XD.

airbus_comm.title: Communications Officer
airbus_comm.description: Creation of audiovisual materials, HTML5 showcase websites, community management, teaser production.

airbus_tech.title: Prototype Technician
airbus_tech.description: Helicopter project coordination, project data monitoring and maintenance, project missing parts analysis.
